#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,a[50],temp,sum,j,x,c;
    temp = 0;
    c = 0;
    while(temp==0)
    {
        sum = j = x = 0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n==0)
            break;
        c = c + 1;
        while(j<n)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[j]);
            sum = sum + a[j];
            j++;
        }
        sum = sum/n;
        j = 0;
        while(j<n)
        {
            if(a[j]<sum)
                x = x + (sum-a[j]);
            j++;
        }
        printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",c,x);
    }
    return 0;
}
